name: DLA PIPER LLP (US) (FOR THE GOVERNMENT OF PUERTO RICO)

sampleDescriptions: Medical supply chain manufacturing incentives, including: H.R. 7527, the Medical Manufacturing, Economic Development, and Sustainability (MMEDS) Act; and H.R. 6443, Securing the National Supply Chain
